sentences.sContent: "There can be no global agreement without adaptation assistance and because of the nature of climate impacts there will be much less global security without it," says the report.
sentences.sContent_eng: "There can be no global agreement without adaptation assistance and because of the nature of climate impacts there will be much less global security without it," says the report.
sentences.sCn: “没有对适应气候变化的帮助，就不可能达成全球协议，而且由于气候影响的本质，缺少了这种帮助，全球安全将大大降低。” 该报告说。

synos.tran: 适应；改编；改编本，改写本

words.tran: 适合的；能适应的；可修改的
适配器；改编者；接合器；适应者
[通信] 适配器；（美）改编者；转接器（等于adapter）
